sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import './postjob.css' import axios from "axios"; const PostJob = () => { const [jobs , setJob] = useState({title:'' , description:'',file:'' ,amount:'' ,creator:'meltwater', projectDelivery:'' , skills:'' ,numberWorker:'' }); const {title , description , file , skills ,creator, projectDelivery , amount , numberWorker} = jobs ; const handleChange = e => { setJob({...jobs , [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) }; const submitjob = e => { e.preventDefault() // Do Axios Post Request Here axios.post(`${process.env.API}/postjob` , jobs,{ headers:{'Content-Type': 'application/json'}}).then(res => console.log(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }; return (

Tell us what you need done

Contact skilled our workers within minutes. View profiles, ratings, portfolios and chat with them.

Start with a bit about yourself or your business, and include an overview of what you need done.
